resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73289</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73289</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-9e60-4529-22f3-d38e82e0f55f#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Honfoglalás kori asszonyi viselet, László Gyula grafikája.</string>
            <string language="en">Women's custome in the age of the Hungarian Conquest, the graphic of Gyula László.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Custome der Frauen im Alter der ungarischen 
Eroberung, die Graphik von Gyula László.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le custome des femmes dans l'âge de la conquête
hongroise, le graphique de Gyula László.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Custome na idade do conquest hungarian, o 
gráfico das mulheres de Gyula László.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Custome nell'età della conquista ungherese, il 
grafico delle donne di Gyula László.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναικών custome στην ηλικία της ουγγρικής 
κατάκτησης, ο γραφικός Gyula Lαszlσ.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Custome en la edad de la conquista húngara, el 
gráfico de las mujeres de Gyula László.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A férfi viselethez hasonló, módos női ruházatot látunk, ékszerekkel.</string>
            <string language="en">We can see wealthy women's wear with pieces of jewellery, silimlar to men's wear</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">viselet,  női,  László Gyula,  ékszerek,  honfoglalás,  </string>
            <string language="en">wear, woman's, László Gyula, a piece of jewellery, conquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir können Abnutzung der wohlhabenden Frauen mit den 
Stücken Schmucksachen sehen, silimlar zur Abnutzung der Männer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous pouvons voir l'usure des femmes riches avec des 
morceaux de bijoux, silimlar à l'usure des hommes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós podemos ver o desgaste das mulheres ricas com as 
partes de jóia, silimlar ao desgaste dos homens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Possiamo vedere l'usura delle donne ricche con le parti di
monili, silimlar ad usura degli uomini</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορούμε να δούμε την ένδυση των πλούσιων 
γυναικών με τα κομμάτια των κοσμημάτων, silimlar στην ένδυση 
των ανδρών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Podemos ver el desgaste de las mujeres ricas con los 
pedazos de joyería, silimlar al desgaste de los hombres</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abnutzung, Frau, László Gyula, ein Stück 
Schmucksachen, Eroberung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usure, femme, László Gyula, un morceau de bijoux, 
conquête</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desgaste, mulher, László Gyula, uma parte de jóia, 
conquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">usura, donna, László Gyula, una parte di monili, 
conquista</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένδυση, γυναίκας, Lαszlσ Gyula, ένα κομμάτι των 
κοσμημάτων, κατάκτηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desgaste, mujer, László Gyula, un pedazo de joyería,
conquista</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73289</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>

  </manifestation>
